sentence_zh_TW: 當我發現我的朋友對我撒謊時，我真的感到非常生氣，因為這打破了我們之間的信任。
sentence: I felt really ______ when I discovered that my friend had lied to me, as it shattered the trust between us.

sentence_zh_TW: 許多人經常在繁忙的生活中忽略了基本的健康飲食。
sentence: Many people ______ neglect basic healthy eating in their busy lives.

sentence_zh_TW: 在陽光明媚的天氣裡，很多人喜歡戴著帽子來保護自己的面部。
sentence: On sunny days, many people like to wear a ______ to protect their faces.

sentence_zh_TW: 在正式的場合中，介紹自己時要清楚地說出自己的名字以便他人記住。
sentence: In formal occasions, it's important to clearly state your ______ so that others can remember it.

sentence_zh_TW: 在得到幫助後，記得要感謝那些在你有需要時支持你的人。
sentence: After receiving help, remember to ______ those who supported you in your time of need.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這場比賽中，選手們努力爭取能進入前六名，而我也在其中第六名的位置。
sentence: In this competition, the contestants strive to secure a place in the top six, and I found myself in ______ place.

sentence_zh_TW: 當春天來臨時，花朵綻放，讓整個公園變得格外美麗。
sentence: When spring arrives, the flowers bloom, making the entire park look exceptionally ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 學校的規定明確表示不允許在課堂上使用手機，這是為了不影響學習。
sentence: The school rules clearly state that using mobile phones in class is not ______ to avoid disrupting learning.

sentence_zh_TW: 隨著科技的進步，越來越多的機器人開始進入我們的日常生活，從家務到醫療服務都有它們的身影。
sentence: With the advancement of technology, more and more ______ are beginning to enter our daily lives, from household chores to medical services.

sentence_zh_TW: 這本書的內容相當吸引人，讓我一次讀了好幾個小時都還想繼續閱讀。
sentence: The content of this book is ______ engaging, allowing me to read for several hours and still want to continue.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個數位科技發展迅速的時代，幾乎每個人都擁有一部智能電話以隨時保持聯繫。
sentence: In this fast-developing digital tech era, almost everyone owns a smart ______ to stay connected at all times.

sentence_zh_TW: 經過多年的努力和學習，他終於成為了一位優秀的科學家，這是他的夢想。
sentence: After years of hard work and learning, he finally managed to ______ an excellent scientist, which was his dream.

sentence_zh_TW: 孩子們在公園裡忙著挖一個大洞來建造沙堡。
sentence: The children were busy ______ a large pit in the park to build a sandcastle.

sentence_zh_TW: 數學是一門研究數量、結構、變化和空間的科學，對各種科學的進步至關重要。
sentence: _______ is a science that studies numbers, structure, change, and space, and is vital for the advancement of various scientific fields.

sentence_zh_TW: 這隻小狗有一身可愛的棕色毛皮，讓人忍不住想要撫摸。
sentence: The little puppy has a lovely ______ coat that makes everyone want to pet it.

sentence_zh_TW: 對於視力不佳的人來說，眼鏡是一種幫助他們看清事物的有用工具。
sentence: For people with poor eyesight, ______ are a useful tool to help them see clearly.

sentence_zh_TW: 科學是透過觀察和實驗來理解自然界的系統性研究。
sentence: _______ is the systematic study of the natural world through observation and experimentation.

sentence_zh_TW: 夏天是一年中最溫暖的季節，許多人會趁這個時候去海灘度假。
sentence: _______ is the warmest season of the year when many people take vacations to the beach.

sentence_zh_TW: 寵物可以是孩子們的好朋友，教會他們責任和愛的價值。
sentence: A ______ can be a great friend for children, teaching them the values of responsibility and love.

sentence_zh_TW: 如果你努力學習，你將能夠在未來達成你的目標。
sentence: If you study ______, you will be able to achieve your goals in the future.
